item.title: DigitalHumanitiesScholar on "What is Digital Humanities?"
item.dc:creator: DigitalHumanitiesScholar
item.description:
Hello Digital Humanists,

I am creating a video from crowdsourced answers to the question "What is Digital Humanities?". I would appreciate any short response you could provide re same and permission to publish your answer in the video. The aim of this project is to provide a brief introduction to DH for novice digital humanists or those who are not familiar with the field.

Looking forward to hearing your suggestions. Please also provide your Twitter username re acknowledging your contribution.

Many thanks,

Róisín O'Brien
http://www.roisinobrien.com
http://www.twitter.com/roisinanneob

item.title: mkeeler on "collaborative software for transcribing digital images of handwritten documents"
item.dc:creator: mkeeler
item.description: I am looking for software that will display digital images files of handwritten material on the same screen as workspace for creating transcriptions of that material, preferably in a collaboration context.
